channel.title: playground on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in playground on My Hugo

item.title: Playing With GNUMake
item.description: and # test $(and c1,c2,c3,...N) # return N or '' if any of them is empty # # e.g. # make -f and.mk A=a B=b C= result = $(and $(A),$(B),$(C)) $(info result=$(result)) all:;@: $ make -f and.mk A=a result= $ make -f and.mk A=a B=b result= $ make -f and.mk A=a B=b C=c result=c $ make -f and.mk B=b C=c result= $ or - fallbacks # test $(or c1,c2,c3,...N) # return '' or the first non-empty # # e.
